Verses: 1 yesu Indha Vasanangalaiyellaam Sollimudiththapinbu, Avar Thammudaiya Seesharai Nokki:
2 irandu Naalaikkuppinbu Paskaapandigai Varumendru Ariveergal; Appozhudhu, Manushakumaaran Siluvaiyil Araiyappaduvadharku Oppukkodukkappaduvaar Endraar.
3 appozhudhu, Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Vedhapaaragarum Janaththin Moopparum, Kaaipaa Ennappatta Piradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Aranmanaiyile Koodivandhu,
4 yesuvaith Thandhiramaaip Pidiththuk Kolaiseyyumpadi Aalosanaipanninaargal.
5 aagilum Janangalukkulle Kalagamundaagaadhapadikkup Pandigaiyile Appadi Seyyalaagaadhu Endraargal.
6 yesu Beththaaniyaavil Kushtarogiyaayirundha Seemon Veettil Irukkaiyil,
7 oru Sthiree Vilaiyerappetra Parimala Thailamulla Vellaikkalparaniyaik Konduvandhu, Avar Pojanapandhiyilirukkumpodhu, Andhath Thailaththai Avar Sirasinmel Ootrinaal.
8 avarudaiya Seeshargal Adhaikkandu Visanamadaindhu: Indha Veen Selavu Ennaththirku?
9 indhath Thailaththai Uyarndha Vilaikku Vitru, Thariththirarukkuk Kodukkalaame Endraargal.
10 yesu Adhai Arindhu, Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Indha Sthireeyai En Thondharavu Paduththugireergal? Ennidaththil Narkiriyaiyai Seydhirukkiraal.
11 thariththirar Eppodhum Ungalidaththilirukkiraargal. Naano Eppodhum Ungalidaththil Iren.
12 ival Indhath Thailaththai En Sareeraththin Mel Ootrinadhu Ennai Adakkampannuvadharku Eththanamaana Seygaiyaayirukkiradhu.
13 indha Suvisesham Ulagaththil Engenge Pirasangikkappadumo Angange Ivalai Ninaippadharkaaga Ival Seydhadhum Sollappadum Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
14 appozhudhu, Panniruvaril Oruvanaagiya Yoodhaaskaariyoththu Enbavan Piradhaana Aasaariyaridaththirkuppoi:
15 naan Avarai Ungalukkuk Kaattikkodukkiren, Neengal Enakku Enna Kodukkireergal Endraan. Avargal Avanukku Muppadhu Vellikkaasaik Kodukka Udanpattaargal.
16 adhumudhal Avan Avaraik Kaattikkoduppadharku Samayam Paarththukkondirundhaan.
17 pulippillaadha Appappandigaiyin Mudhal Naalile, Seeshargal Yesuvinidaththil Vandhu: Paskaavaip Pusippadharku Naangal Enge Umakku Aayaththam Panna Siththamaayirukkireer Endru Kettaargal.

18 adharku Avar: Neengal Nagaraththile Innaanidaththirkup Poi: En Velai Sameebamaayirukkiradhu, Un Veettile En Seesharodekootap Paskaavai Aasarippen Endru Podhagar Sollugiraar Endru Avanukku Sollungal Endraar.
19 yesu Karpiththapadi Seeshargal Poi, Paskaavai Aayaththampanninaargal.
20 saayangaalamaanapodhu, Panniruvarodungooda Avar Pandhiyirundhaar.
21 avargal Pojanampannugaiyil, Avar: Ungaliloruvan Ennaik Kaattikkoduppaan Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
22 appozhudhu, Avargal Migavum Thukkamadaindhu, Avarai Nokki: Aandavare Naano, Naano? Endru Ovvoruvaraaik Ketkaththodanginaargal.
23 avar Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Ennode Koodath Thaalaththil Kaiyidugiravane Ennaik Kaattikkoduppaan.

24 manushakumaaran Thammaikkuriththu Ezhudhiyirukkirapadiye Pogiraar; Aagilum, Endha Manushanaal Manushakumaaran Kaattikkodukkappadugiraaro, Andha Manushanukku Aiyo; Andha Manushan Piravaadhirundhaanaanaal Avanukku Nalamaayirukkum Endraar.
25 avaraik Kaattikkoduththa Yoodhaasum Avarai Nokki: Rabee, Naano? Endraan; Adharku Avar: Nee Sonnapadidhaan Endraar.
26 avargal Pojanam Pannugaiyil, Yesu Appaththai Eduththu, Aaseervadhiththu, Adhaip Pittu, Seeshargalukkuk Koduththu: Neengal Vaangip Pusiyungal, Idhu Ennudaiya Sareeramaayirukkiradhu Endraar.
27 pinbu, Paaththiraththaiyum Eduththu, Sthoththirampanni, Avargalukkuk Koduththu: Neengal Ellaarum Idhile Paanampannungal;
28 idhu Paavamannippundaagumpadi Anegarukkaagach Sindhappadugira Pudhu Udanpadikkaikkuriya Ennudaiya Raththamaayirukkiradhu.

29 idhu Mudhal Indhath Thiraatchappazharasaththai Navamaanadhaai Ungalodekooda En Pidhaavin Raajyaththile Naan Paanam Pannum Naal Varaikkum Idhaip Paanam Pannuvadhillaiyendru Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
30 avargal Sthoththirappaattaip Paadina Pinbu, Olivamalaikkup Purappattup Ponaargal.
31 appozhudhu Yesu Avargalai Nokki: Meyppanai Vettuven, Mandhaiyin Aadugal Sidharadikkappadum Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Indha Raaththiriyile Neengal Ellaarum Ennimiththam Idaraladaiveergal.
32 aagilum, Naan Uyirththezhundha Pinbu, Ungalukku Munne Galileyaavukkup Poven Endraar.
33 pedhuru Avarukkup Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Umadhunimiththam Ellaarum Idaraladaindhaalum, Naan Orukkaalum Idaraladaiyen Endraan.
34 yesu Avanai Nokki: Indha Raaththiriyile Seval Koovugiradharku Munne, Nee Ennai Moondru Tharam Marudhalippaai Endru Meyyaagave Unakku Sollugiren Endraar.
35 adharkup Pedhuru: Naan Ummode Marikkavendiyadhaayirundhaalum, Ummai Marudhalikkamaatten Endraan; Seeshargal Ellaarum Appadiye Sonnaargal.
36 appozhudhu, Yesu Avargalode Gedhsemane Ennappatta Idaththirku Vandhu, Seeshargalai Nokki: Naan Ange Poi Jebampannumalavum Neengal Inge Utkaarndhirungal Endru Solli;
37 pedhuruvaiyum, Sepadheyuvin Kumaarar Iruvaraiyum Koottikkondupoi, Thukkamadaiyavum, Viyaagulappadavum Thodanginaar.
38 appozhudhu, Avar: En Aaththumaa Maranaththukkedhuvaana Thukkangondirukkiradhu; Neengal Inge Thangi, Ennode Kooda Vizhiththirungal Endru Solli;

39 satru Appurampoi, Mukanguppura Vizhundhu: En Pidhaave, Indhappaaththiram Ennaivittu Neengakkoodumaanaal Neengumpadiseyyum; Aagilum En Siththaththinpadiyalla, Ummudaiya Siththaththinpadiye Aagakkadavadhu Endru Jebampanninaar.
40 pinbu, Avar Seeshargalidaththil Vandhu, Avargal Niththiraipannugiradhaikkandu, Pedhuruvai Nokki: Neengal Oru Mani Neramaavadhu Ennodekooda Vizhiththirukkakkoodaadhaa?
41 neengal Sodhanaikkutpadaadhapadikku Vizhiththirundhu Jebampannungal; Aavi Urchaagamulladhudhaan, Maamsamo Balaveenamulladhu Endraar.

42 avar Marupadiyum Irandaandharam Poi: En Pidhaave, Indhap Paaththiraththil Naan Paanampanninaalozhiya Idhu Ennai Vittu Neengakkoodaadhaagil, Ummudaiya Siththaththinpadi Aagakkadavadhu Endru Jebampanninaar.
43 avar Thirumba Vandhapodhu, Avargal Marupadiyum, Niththiraipannugiradhaik Kandaar; Avargaludaiya Kangal Migundha Niththiraimayakkam Adaindhirundhadhu.
44 avar Marupadiyum Avargalaivittup Poi, Moondraandharamum Andha Vaarththaigalaiye Solli Jebampanninaar.
45 pinbu Avar Thammudaiya Seeshargalidaththil Vandhu: Ini Niththiraipanni Ilaippaarungal; Idho, Manushakumaaran Paavigaludaiya Kaigalil Oppukkodukkappadugira Velaivandhadhu.
46 ennaik Kaattikkodukkiravan, Idho, Vandhuvittaan, Ezhundhirungal Povom Endraar.

47 avar Ippadip Pesugaiyil, Panniruvaril Oruvanaagiya Yoodhaas Vandhaan; Avanode Kootap Piradhaana Aasaariyarum Janaththin Moopparum Anuppina Thiralaana Janangal Pattayangalaiyum, Thadigalaiyum Pidiththukkonduvandhaargal.
48 avaraik Kaattikkodukkiravan: Naan Evanai Muththanjeyveno Avandhaan, Avanaip Pidiththukkollungal Endru Avargalukku Adaiyaalam Solliyirundhaan.
49 udane, Avan Yesuvinidaththil Vandhu: Rabee, Vaazhga Endru Solli, Avarai Muththanjeydhaan.
50 yesu Avanai Nokki: Sinegidhane Ennaththirkaaga Vandhirukkiraai Endraar. Appozhudhu Avargal Kitta Vandhu, Yesuvin Mel Kaipottu, Avaraip Pitiththaargal.
51 appozhudhu Yesuvodirundhavargalil Oruvan Kaineettith Than Pattayaththai Uruvi, Piradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Velaikkaaranaik Kaadhara Vettinaan.
52 appozhudhu, Yesu Avanai Nokki: Un Pattayaththai Thirumba Adhin Uraiyile Podu; Pattayaththai Edukkira Yaavarum Pattayaththaal Madindhu Povaargal.
53 naan Ippozhudhu En Pidhaavai Vendikkondaal, Avar Pannirandu Lekiyonukku Adhigamaana Thoodharai Ennidaththil Anuppamaattaarendru Ninaikkiraayaa?
54 appadi Seyvenaanaal, Ivvidhamaai Sampavikkavendum Engira Vedhavaakkiyangal Eppadi Niraiverum Endraar.

55 andha Velaiyile Yesu Janangalai Nokki: Kallanaip Pidikka Purappadugiradhu Pola, Neengal Pattayangalaiyum Thadigalaiyum Eduththukkondu Ennai Pidikkavandheergal; Naan Thinandhorum Ungal Naduvile Utkaarndhu Dhevaalayaththil Ubadhesampannikkondirundhen; Appozhudhu, Neengal Ennai Pidikkavillaiye.
56 aagilum Theerkkadharisigal Ezhudhiyirukkira Vasanangal Niraiverumpadi Ivaigalellaam Sambavikkiradhu Endraar. Appozhudhu, Seeshargalellaarum Avaraivittu Odipponaargal.
57 yesuvaippidiththavargal Avaraip Piradhaana Aasaariyanaagiya Kaaipaavinidaththirkuk Konduponaargal; Ange Vedhapaaragarum Moopparum Koodivandhirundhaargal.
58 pedhuru, Thooraththile Avarukkup Pinsendru, Piradhaana Aasaariyanudaiya Aramanaivaraikkum Vandhu, Ulle Piravesiththu, Mudivaippaarkkumpadi Sevagarode Utkaarndhaan.
59 piradhaana Aasaariyarum Moopparum Sangaththaar Yaavarum Yesuvaik Kolaiseyyumpadi Avarukku Virodhamaaip Poisaatchi Thedinaargal.
60 oruvarum Agappadavillai; Anegar Vandhu Poi Saatchi Solliyum Avargal Saatchi Ovvavillai; Kadaisiyile Irandu Poisaatchigal Vandhu:
61 dhevanudaiya Aalayaththai Idiththuppodavum, Moondru Naalaikkulle Adhaik Kattavum Ennaale Aagum Endraan Endru Ivan Sonnaan Endraargal.
62 appozhudhu, Piradhaana Aasaariyan Ezhundhirundhu, Avarai Nokki: Ivargal Unakku Virodhamaai Saatchi Sollugiradhaikkuriththu Nee Ondrum Sollugiradhillaiyaa Endraan.

63 yesuvo Pesaamalirundhaar. Appozhudhu, Piradhaana Aasaariyan Avarai Nokki: Nee Dhevanudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Kiristhuthaanaa? Adhai Engalukku Sollumpadi Jeevanulla Dhevanperil Unnai Aanaiyittuk Ketkiren Endraan.

64 adharku Yesu: Neer Sonnapadidhaan; Andriyum Manushakumaaran Sarva Vallavarudaiya Valadhu Paarisaththil Veetriruppadhaiyum Vaanaththin Mekangalmel Varuvadhaiyum Idhumudhal Kaanpeergalendru Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
65 appozhudhu Piradhaana Aasaariyan Than Vasthirangalaik Kizhiththukkondu: Ivan Dhevadhooshanam Sonnaan; Ini Saatchigal Namakku Vendiyadhenna? Idho Ivan Thooshanaththai Ippozhudhu Ketteergale.
66 ungalukku Ennamaaith Thondrugiradhendru Kettaan. Adharku Avargal: Maranaththukkup Paaththiranaayirukkiraan Endraargal.
67 appozhudhu, Avarudaiya Mugaththil Thuppi, Avaraik Kuttinaargal; Silar Avaraik Kannaththil Araindhu:
68 kiristhuve, Ummai Adiththavan Yaar? Adhai Gnaanadhirushtiyinaal Engalukku Sollum Endraargal.
69 aththarunaththil Pedhuru Veliye Vandhu Aramanai Mutraththil Utkaarndhirundhaan. Appozhudhu, Velaikkaari Oruththi Avanidaththil Vandhu: Neeyum Galileyanaagiya Yesuvode Kooda Irundhaai Endraal.
70 adharku Avan: Nee Sollugiradhu Enakkuth Theriyaadhu Endru Ellaarukkum Munbaaga Marudhaliththaan.
71 avan, Vaasal Mandapaththirkup Ponapozhudhu Veroruththi Avanaik Kandu: Ivanum Nasareyanaagiya Yesuvode Kooda Irundhaan Endru Ange Irundhavargalukku Sonnaal.
72 avano: Andha Manushanai Naan Ariyen Endru Aanaiyittu, Marupadiyum Marudhaliththaan.
73 satru Neraththirkupinbu Ange Nindravargal Pedhuruvinidaththil Vandhu: Meyyaagave Neeyum Avargalil Oruvan; Un Pechchu Unnai Velippaduththugiradhu Endraargal.
74 appozhudhu Avan: Andha Manushanai Ariyen Endru Solli, Sabikkavum Saththiyampannavum Thodanginaan. Udane Seval Koovitru.
75 appozhudhu Pedhuru: Seval Koovugiradharku Munne, Nee Ennai Moondru Tharam Marudhalippaai Endru Yesu Thannidaththil Sonna Vasanaththai Ninaiththukondu, Veliye Poi, Manangasandhu Azhudhaan.
